text: He mominaharu! Allaha timro pariksa saman'ya avasthama sikarabata linecha junaki timile hatale athava bhalale (astra) gardachau (arthat eharamako avasthama sikarako nisedhitatabata) jasabata allahale thaha pa'os ki adrsya rupama usasamga ko dara'umcha. Tasartha jasale tyasapachi sima'ullanghana garnecha tyasako nimti kastadayaka sajaya cha
